settings.select: temp.[Material_No] ,temp.[Material_Name] ,isnull(temp.[Model],'') as Model ,isnull(temp.[Unit],'') as Unit ,isnull(temp.[Material_Tu],'') as Material_Tu ,temp.[Material_No] as ITEM_NO ,temp.[Material_Name] as ITEM_NAME
settings.from: (select * from [QHD_Mes].dbo.ERP_MaterialDictionary where Material_No is not null) as temp
